verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: < p] > [ARG0: Veteran journalist Carl Bernstein] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [V: accused] [ARG1: Trump lawyer Rudy Giuliani] [ARG2: of trying to " throw bombs " into special counsel Robert Mueller 's investigation into possible collusion between the Trump campaign and Russia.</p >]

< p > Veteran journalist Carl Bernstein on Friday accused [ARG0: Trump lawyer Rudy Giuliani] of [V: trying] [ARG1: to " throw bombs " into special counsel Robert Mueller 's investigation into possible collusion between the Trump campaign and Russia.</p] >

< p > Veteran journalist Carl Bernstein on Friday accused [ARG0: Trump lawyer Rudy Giuliani] of trying to " [V: throw] [ARG1: bombs] " [ARG2: into special counsel Robert Mueller 's investigation into possible collusion between the Trump campaign and Russia.</p] >
